post.text: Very proud of our next First Lady Melania Trump! #MakeAmericaSafeAgain

comment.author: Elizabeth
comment.text: I literally cried like a baby while her speech was under way! Her words cut straight to my heart that I have for America! I pray God Almighty blesses this Great Country to be as safe, productive, and peaceful as when I was just a kid myself... that my children and grandchildren have a good future to live for! The way I grew up! God Bless Donald Trump, and God Bless America!

replies.author: Forrest
replies.text: Did you also cry when First Lady Nico Obama gave the same speech? Melania plagiarized the FLOTUS' speech. How pathetic is that????
